long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use Via to easily navigate GitHub and Jira.

Users can:
* Quickly search their GitHub organization and Jira instance
* Save links in GitHub such as repositories and pull requests
* Save links in Jira such as tickets and sprint boards
* See connections between GitHub pull requests and Jira tickets
